overview: After the first volume's success, this second entry, Garcons d'Etage 2, presents us the new adventures of lobby boys, selected according to very specific criteria by hotel management. They will be at disposal for a Russian colonel, Italian producer, young groom and the son of a sheik.  This is a perfect example of perfect customer care: A cute hotel waiter in a luxury hotel delivers room service to a customer. He is willing to do anything to keep him happy, even if it means getting fucked and fucking.
title: Garcons d'Etage 2
